extension_description.message: Shows SEO issues as you navigate pages. Displays performance data and full AMP status and errors for HTML pages.

ui_titles_icon_web_vitals_out_of_bound.message: Some Web Vitals values are out of bound

ui_prompt_reload_page_text.message: Please reload the page to fetch updated page information

shared_requests_types_unknown_probably_s.message: Probably loaded by a service worker

popup_amp_is_disabled.message: AMP-related features are disabled for this browser ($1)

popup_amp_open_google_validator_button_t.message: Open current page in Google's online AMP validator

popup_amp_open_google_sd_validator_butto.message: Open current page in Google's online structured data validator

popup_amp_load_amp_page_for_details.message: Load AMP page to view details

popup_amp_status_amp_version_is_valid.message: The AMP version of this page is valid

popup_amp_status_cache_add_to_cache_help.message: Click to add the current page to the AMP cache

popup_amp_status_cache_page_added.message: This AMP page has been added to Google AMP cache

popup_amp_status_cache_error_adding_page.message: There was an error adding this AMP page to Google AMP cache

popup_canonical_status_is_empty.message: There is a canonical link on this page but it is empty!

popup_canonical_status_missing_on_amp_pa.message: This is an AMP page, it should have a canonical link - to another page or to itself

popup_canonical_status_multiple_canonica.message: There are multiple canonical links on this page: there can be only one!

popup_canonical_status_canonical_blocked.message: The target page for the canonical link on this page is blocked by a robots.txt file

popup_canonical_status_has_redirects_mes.message: The canonical link is valid but requires one or more redirects. Consider using the actual canonical link instead

popup_canonical_status_error_timed_out.message: Could not read canonical page, it timed out

popup_canonical_status_error_invalid_dom.message: Status code was 0, probably invalid domain

popup_canonical_status_error_not_authori.message: it requires authorization or logging-in to be accessed (code: $1)

popup_hreflang_error_blocked_meta.message: HReflang tag for $1 is blocked from indexing by robots meta tag, cannot be used as hreflang

popup_hreflang_error_not_canonical.message: HrefLang targets should not be canonicalized to another page.

popup_hreflang_error_blocked_too_many_re.message: HReflang tag for $1 has $2 records, should only have one

popup_hreflang_error_not_fully_qualified.message: HReflang link for $1 is not fully qualified, including transport (ie http:// or https://)

popup_hreflang_error_invalid_lang_code.message: HReflang language code $1 in $2 is invalid, should be a language code from iso639-1

popup_hreflang_error_invalid_country_or_.message: HReflang location or script code $1 in $2 is invalid, should be a location code from iso3166-1 alpha 2 or a script code from iso15924

popup_hreflang_error_invalid_country_cod.message: HReflang location $1 in $2 is invalid, should be a location code from iso3166-1 alpha 2

popup_hreflang_error_invalid_script_code.message: HReflang script variation $1 in $2 is invalid, should be a script variation code from iso15924

popup_hreflang_error_language_code_not_l.message: HReflang language code $1 is not well-formed. Should be xx, xx-yy or xx-yy-zz with xx a language code and optionally yy a country or script code, separated by -. If yy is a script code then zz is optional and should be a location code.

popup_hreflang_error_no_href_lang_in_lin.message: No valid hreflang elements found in linked hreflang document for language $1

popup_hreflang_error_invalid_href_lang_i.message: Required hreflang for language $1 in linked document $2 is incorrect or missing , should be $3 with language code $4

popup_hreflang_error_linked_page_blocked.message: Linked page is blocked by robots.txt

popup_ogp_open_debugger_title.message: Open current page in Facebook's online debugger

popup_tcards_open_tester_title.message: Go to the Twitter Cards online tester

popup_page_title_way_too_short.message: This page title is way too short, up to 55-65 characters is considered good

popup_page_title_a_bit_short.message: This page title could be a bit longer, up to 55-65 characters is considered good

popup_page_title_a_bit_too_long.message: This page title is a bit too long, up to 55-65 characters is considered good

popup_page_title_way_too_long.message: This page title is way too long, up to 55-65 characters is considered good

popup_not_enabled_on_this_page.message: SEOInfo does not operate on browser configuration, extension or pages that you have excluded through configuration

popup_html_only_json_ld.message: Only json+ld structured data is reported on this page

popup_html_only_microdata.message: Only microdata structured data are reported on this page

popup_audit_help.message: When you click on this button, SEOInfo will ask Google PageSpeed Insight to audit the current page using its API. The current page must be accessible through the internet (ie not running locally on your computer) and you need to be online for this to work. No API key is needed.

popup_audit_error_no_data.message: No response, you're not online or API might be temporarily unavailable

popup_audit_error_no_connection.message: Cannot connect to PageSpeed Insight to check $1 or PageSpeed Insight cannot connect to the site.

popup_html_general_error_try_another_pag.message: Can't read SEO information for that page. Maybe try a different page?

popup_html_save_button_title.message: Save page information and/or a page screenshot under a separate tab for printing or saving to a file

popup_status_hover_indexable_ok.message: This page can be indexed by search engines

popup_status_hover_indexable_blocked_rob.message: This page cannot be indexed by search engines, it is blocked by a robots.txt file

popup_status_hover_indexable_blocked_met.message: This page cannot be indexed by search engines, it is blocked by a meta tag in the page

popup_status_hover_indexable_blocked_hea.message: This page cannot be indexed by search engines, it is blocked by a response header from the server

popup_status_hover_followable_ok.message: Search engines can follow links on this page

popup_status_hover_followable_not_ok.message: Search engines cannot follow links on this page

popup_status_hover_followable_blocked_me.message: Search engines are blocked from following all links on this page by a meta tag

popup_status_hover_followable_blocked_he.message: Search engines are blocked from following all links on this page by a header from from the server

popup_status_hover_mobile_ok.message: This page seems to be compatible with mobile devices - full testing still required

popup_status_hover_mobile_not_ok.message: This page is not compatible with mobile devices

popup_status_crawl_section_mobile_ok.message: This page seems to be compatible with mobile devices - Full testing

popup_status_crawl_section_mobile_not_ok.message: Not compatible with mobile devices, missing or invalid meta viewport - Full testing

popup_status_hover_sd_validation_ok.message: This page has valid structured data.

popup_status_hover_sd_validation_not_ok.message: This page structured data has errors. Check the Structured Data tab of details.

popup_status_hover_mixed_content_ok.message: This page does not seem to have any mixed content issue (http on https page)

popup_status_hover_mixed_content_not_ok.message: This page requests some HTTP content while it is served over HTTPS

popup_status_crawl_section_mixed_content.message: This page does not seem to have any mixed content issue
Some mixed content detected. Please check the Resources tab for details

popup_options_item_title_google_dev_api_.message: Get if from developer.google.com. Only needed for reading and adding to Google AMP cache

popup_options_item_title_excluded_urls_h.message: Enter website URLs where SEOInfo should not operate. Must be fully qualified (ie with http/https) but can include wildards {*}. One per line.

popup_options_item_title_included_urls_h.message: Enter website URLs where SEOInfo should operate. Higher priority than exclusion list. Must be fully qualified (ie with http/https) but can include wildards {*}. One per line.

errors_content_no_perf_data.message: SEOINFO content: no performance data available

errors_background_no_amp_validator.message: SEOINFO: amp validator is not defined

errors_background_amp_validator_not_load.message: AMP validator not loaded, cannot validate AMP page

errors_popup_performance_unable_timing.message: We were not able to gather speed information on this browser and page

errors_popup_performance_unable_sizes.message: We were not able to gather size information on this browser and page

errors_popup_status_is_error.message: This page is not working or missing
